name: Dhar Khages
description: At the dawn of the new Era, the intrepid adventurer seeks to find their lost left sock. It MUST be somewhere, unless, of course, it is nowhere. Follow our champion in their noble quest, as they battle goblins, the undead and bad smells to overcome the fear of a cold left foot. Follow our champion through the Dhar Khages, where they'll discover amazing places, like Nueold Village - be sure to visit Big Dave at the Nueold Tavern, or pay a visit to Boolbyle, the goblin at the Havasoke Geothermal Pools. Will they attend the Royal Ball, held in Kingsberg, at the request of Queen Roger?
